text: Ra yasakā sabai phalaharūlā'ī (vināśalē) ghērihālyō, ra tyasalē juna kharca āphnō sampattimāthi garēkō thiyō, tyasamā duḥkha ra aphaśōcalē hāta malna thālyō ra tyō bagaicā ta ulaṭapalaṭa bha'isakēkō thiyō ra usalē bhanna thālyō ki kāśa mailē āphnō pālanakartāsam̐ga aru kasailā'ī sājhēdāra naṭhaharā'ēkō bha'ē
